ApplyDiskBackup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyDiskBackup
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskId": "disk-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskBackupId": "dbp-xxxxxxxx"
}
ApplyDiskBackup.title: 回滚备份点到原云硬盘

BindAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: 给单块盘绑定定期快照策略

CopySnapshotCrossRegions.title: 将快照从广州复制到北京

CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.document: 创建一个定期快照策略，绑定该定期快照策略的云盘会在每周5的0点创建快照。
CreateAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: 创建定期快照策略

CreateDisks.document: 新购云盘具体配置如下：云盘所在位置为广州二区，云盘大小50GB，云盘类型为普通云盘，所属项目ID为0，付费模式为预付费，购买时长1个月，通知过期且自动续费。
CreateDisks.title: 使用基本参数购买

CreateDisks.document: 在广州三区创建一块云硬盘，云盘类型为高性能云硬盘，大小100GB，付费类型为按小时后付费。
CreateDisks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDisks
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskName": "postPayDisk",
    "Placement": {
        "ProjectId": "0",
        "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3"
    },
    "DiskChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "DiskCount": "1",
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_PREMIUM",
    "DiskSize": "100"
}
CreateDisks.title: 创建按小时后付费云盘

CreateDisks.document: 传入快照创建云硬盘，未传DiskSize参数，此时新购云盘的大小为快照大小，新购云盘复制了快照数据。
CreateDisks.title: 根据快照新建云硬盘

CreateSnapshot.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSnapshot
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SnapshotName": "snap_201711301015",
    "Deadline": "2022-01-08T09:47:55+00:00",
    "DiskId": "disk-lzrg2pwi"
}
CreateSnapshot.title: 创建快照

DeleteAutoSnapshotPolicies.title: 批量删除定期快照策略

DeleteDiskBackups.title: 删除云硬盘备份点

DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicies.title: 查询状态为NORMAL的定期快照策略

DescribeDiskAssociatedAutoSnapshotPolicy.title: 查询云盘disk-dw0bbzws绑定的定期快照策略

DescribeDiskBackups.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDiskBackups
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0
}
DescribeDiskBackups.title: 查询备份点列表

DescribeDiskConfigQuota.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDiskConfigQuota
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InquiryType": "INQUIRY_CBS_CONFIG",
    "DiskChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "Zones": [
        "ap-shanghai-5"
    ],
    "DiskTypes": [
        "CLOUD_PREMIUM"
    ]
}
DescribeDiskConfigQuota.title: 查询上海五区高性能云硬盘的可售卖规格

DescribeDiskStoragePool.document: 部分用户(金融)对cbs集群有独享需求，该接口用来查询用户所拥有的独享集群。
DescribeDiskStoragePool.title: 指定独享集群ID查询集群详情。

InquirePriceModifyDiskBackupQuota.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: InquirePriceModifyDiskBackupQuota
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskId": "disk-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskBackupQuota": 1
}
InquirePriceModifyDiskBackupQuota.title: 修改云硬盘备份点配额询价

InquirePriceModifyDiskExtraPerformance.title: 500G HSSD 额外购买200M性能询价

InquiryPriceCreateDisks.title: 查询购买1个月500G TSSD 带100M额外性能询价

InquiryPriceCreateDisks.document: 查询购买一块大小100GB，云盘类型为高性能云硬盘，计费类型为按小时后付费的价格。
InquiryPriceCreateDisks.title: 查询购买按小时后付费云盘价格

InquiryPriceRenewDisks.title: 查询云盘续费1个月的价格

InquiryPriceRenewDisks.document: 实例当前到期时间为：2018-03-17 15:15:03，需续费一个月，调用本接口续费实例挂载的预付费云盘，使云盘与实例的到期时间对齐。
InquiryPriceRenewDisks.title: 续费实例时，需续费挂载的预付费云盘，使云盘与实例的到期时间对齐。

InquiryPriceResizeDisk.title: 查询云盘扩容到200G的价格

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.document: 修改该定期快照策略的名称为data_disk_auto_snapshot，且将IsPermanent置为TRUE，通过该定期快照策略创建的快照为永久保留的快照。
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyId": "asp-nqu08k2l",
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyName": "data_disk_auto_snapshot",
    "IsPermanent": "TRUE"
}
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.title: 修改定期快照策略属性

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyId": "asp-01928374",
    "IsActivated": "true"
}
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.title: 示例请求

ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoSnapshotPolicyId": "asp-01928374",
    "IsActivated": "true"
}
ModifyAutoSnapshotPolicyAttribute.title: 示例请求2

POST / HTTP/1.1

<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskName": "test_data_disk",
    "DiskIds": [
        "disk-fyctkqsf"
    ]
}
ModifyDiskAttributes.title: 修改云硬盘名称

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskId": "disk-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskBackupQuota": 1
}
ModifyDiskBackupQuota.title: 调整云硬盘备份点配额

ModifyDisksChargeType.document: 本示例用于切换一个云盘的计费模式（将按量计费云盘转换为包年包月云盘，并购买一个月时长）。
ModifyDisksChargeType.title: 切换云盘的计费模式

ModifyDisksRenewFlag.title: 将云盘设置为自动续费

RenewDisk.title: 给云盘续费一个月，并设置自动续费标识

RenewDisk.document: 实例当前到期时间为：2018-03-30 20:15:03，需续费一个月，调用本接口续费实例挂载的预付费云盘，使云盘与实例的到期时间对齐，并设置云盘为自动续费。
RenewDisk.title: 续费实例时，需续费挂载的预付费云盘，使云盘与实例的到期时间对齐。

POST / HTTP/1.1

X-TC-Action: ResizeDisk
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DiskSize": "200",
    "DiskId": "disk-lzrg2pwi"
}
ResizeDisk.title: 将云硬盘扩容到200G
